attributes.action: Give Britain back to the British People.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
You and your party are meant to represent the wishes of the British people, give us back our voice put these issues to the vote;
1/ Stop all funding to Europe and take back all that has been surrendered to Brussels.
2/ Use the money to improve the lives of the British citizens, Health Care, Pensions, Army, Housing, Police.
3/ The vote on capital punishment, Hanging!
4/ Introduce stricter entry into Britain, Language Funding, self support, Skills, our customs, rights and religion come first!
5/ Prisons, British Law, bring reality back to this shackled institute.
6/ Give us back the rights to be British and independent and live by common sense, I think we are grown up enough to handle it and be trusted!
7/ All MP’s, get your faces out of the trough, put a stop to the wide spread corruption within our own parliament, ripping off the British Tax payer is not a right you were given, you are there to serve US and therefore accountable to us!
8/ Human Rights, how about the rights of the majority to live a decent life under British rule.
You have a lot to answer for, Treason being top of the list, give us back our country and voice.

rejection.details: There are already a large number of petitions covering these issues live on the site.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
